https://tmrev.io/movie/828139-Dreams of Alpheoni 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Alexander Alekseev, Alyosha, Alfeoni ... artist, animator, inventor. The author of "Night on Bald Mountain" — one of the most mysterious films in the history of animation and the inventor of a unique device — a needle screen . He did the first color commercials and the prologue to the Orson Welles film "The Trial". He made dreams come true and subordinated reality to his own imagination. Dreams of Alpheoni
